member.name: T:KoenZomers.UniFi.Api.Api
member.summary: Api class to communicate with the UniFi Controller

member.name: F:KoenZomers.UniFi.Api.Api._cookieContainer
member.summary: Cookie container which holds all cookies for sessions towards the UniFi Controller

member.name: P:KoenZomers.UniFi.Api.Api.BaseUri
member.summary: Gets the BaseUri of the UniFi Controller. Needs to be set through the constructor.

member.name: P:KoenZomers.UniFi.Api.Api.SiteId
member.summary: Gets the site identifier of the UniFi Controller. Needs to be set through the constructor.

member.name: P:KoenZomers.UniFi.Api.Api.ConnectionTimeout
member.summary: Timeout in milliseconds to apply to wait at maximum for the UniFi Controller to respond to a request

member.name: P:KoenZomers.UniFi.Api.Api.IsAuthenticated
member.summary: Boolean indicating whether this Api session is authenticated

member.name: M:KoenZomers.UniFi.Api.Api.#ctor(System.Uri)
member.summary: Instantiates a new instance of the UniFi API Controller class against the default UniFi site
member.param: BaseUri of the UniFi Controller, i.e. https://192.168.0.1:8443

member.name: M:KoenZomers.UniFi.Api.Api.#ctor(System.Uri,System.String)
member.summary: Instantiates a new instance of the UniFi API Controller class
member.param: BaseUri of the UniFi Controller, i.e. https://192.168.0.1:8443
Identifier of the site in UniFi. Set to NULL if you want to use the default site.

member.name: M:KoenZomers.UniFi.Api.Api.DisableSslValidation
member.summary: Disables SSL certificate validation in case of using a self signed SSL certificate

member.name: M:KoenZomers.UniFi.Api.Api.EnableTls11and12
member.summary: Enables connecting to a remote server hosting UniFi using a TLS 1.1 or TLS 1.2 certificate

member.name: M:KoenZomers.UniFi.Api.Api.Authenticate(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Authenticate against the UniFi Controller with the provided credentials
member.param: Username to authenticate with
Password to authenticate with
member.returns: Boolean indicating whether the authentication was successful (True) or failed (False)

member.name: M:KoenZomers.UniFi.Api.Api.GetActiveClients
member.summary: Gets the currently connected clients

member.name: M:KoenZomers.UniFi.Api.Api.GetAllClients
member.summary: Gets all clients known to UniFi. This contains both clients currently connected as well as clients that were connected in the past.

member.name: M:KoenZomers.UniFi.Api.Api.GetDevices
member.summary: Gets a list with all UniFi devices

member.name: M:KoenZomers.UniFi.Api.Api.GetSites
member.summary: Gets all sites registered with UniFi

member.name: M:KoenZomers.UniFi.Api.Api.GetClientHistory(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the connection history of the client with the provided MAC Address
member.param: Amount of historic items to retrieve. Most recent connection will be first. Default is last 5 connections to be returned.
MAC Address of the client to retrieve the history for
member.returns: List with all connection history for the client

member.name: M:KoenZomers.UniFi.Api.Api.BlockClient(KoenZomers.UniFi.Api.Responses.Clients)
member.summary: Blocks a client from accessing the network
member.param: Client to block from getting access to the network

member.name: M:KoenZomers.UniFi.Api.Api.BlockClient(System.String)
member.summary: Blocks a client from accessing the network
member.param: The MAC address of the client to block from getting access to the network

member.name: M:KoenZomers.UniFi.Api.Api.AuthorizeGuest(System.String)
member.summary: Authorizes a guest to access the network
member.param: The MAC address of the client to provide access to the network

member.name: M:KoenZomers.UniFi.Api.Api.UnauthorizeGuest(System.String)
member.summary: Unauthorizes a guest to access the network
member.param: The MAC address of the client to revoke its access from the network

member.name: M:KoenZomers.UniFi.Api.Api.UnblockClient(KoenZomers.UniFi.Api.Responses.Clients)
member.summary: Unblocks a client from accessing the network
member.param: Client to unblock from getting access to the network

member.name: M:KoenZomers.UniFi.Api.Api.UnblockClient(System.String)
member.summary: Unblocks a client from accessing the network
member.param: The MAC address of the client to unblock from getting access to the network

member.name: M:KoenZomers.UniFi.Api.Api.RenameClient(KoenZomers.UniFi.Api.Responses.Clients,System.String)
member.summary: Rename Client
member.param: Client to rename
New name

member.name: M:KoenZomers.UniFi.Api.Api.RenameClient(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Rename Client
member.param: Client's User Id for client to be renamed
New name

member.name: M:KoenZomers.UniFi.Api.Api.Logout
member.summary: Logs out from the UniFi Controller
member.returns: True if logout was successful or False if it failed

member.name: T:KoenZomers.UniFi.Api.CookieUtility
member.summary: Internal utility class for working with cookies

member.name: M:KoenZomers.UniFi.Api.CookieUtility.GetAllCookies(System.Net.CookieContainer)
member.summary: Extracts all the cookies from a cookie container so the contents can be read and used
member.returns: IEnumerable containing all cookies available in the CookieContainer

member.name: T:KoenZomers.UniFi.Api.HttpUtility
member.summary: Internal utility class for Http communication with the UniFi Controller

member.name: M:KoenZomers.UniFi.Api.HttpUtility.DisableSslValidation
member.summary: Disables SSL Validation in case of self signed SSL certificates being used

member.name: M:KoenZomers.UniFi.Api.HttpUtility.EnableTls11and12
member.summary: Enables connecting to a remote server hosting UniFi using a TLS 1.1 or TLS 1.2 certificate

member.name: M:KoenZomers.UniFi.Api.HttpUtility.GetRequestResult(System.Uri,System.Net.CookieContainer,System.Int32)
member.summary: Performs a GET request to the provided url to download the page contents
member.param: Url of the page to retrieve
Cookies which have been recorded for this session
Timeout in milliseconds on how long the request may take. Default = 60000 = 60 seconds.

member.name: M:KoenZomers.UniFi.Api.HttpUtility.PostRequest(System.Uri,System.String,System.Net.CookieContainer,System.Int32)
member.summary: Sends a POST request towards UniFi
member.param: Url to POST the postData to
Data to send to the UniFi service, typically a JSON payload
Cookies which have been recorded for this session
Timeout in milliseconds on how long the request may take. Default = 60000 = 60 seconds.
member.returns: The website contents returned by the webserver after posting the data

member.name: M:KoenZomers.UniFi.Api.HttpUtility.AuthenticateViaJsonPostMethod(System.Uri,System.String,System.String,System.Net.CookieContainer,System.Int32)
member.summary: Sends a POST request with JSON variables to authenticate against UniFi
member.param: Url to POST the login information to
Username to authenticate with
Password to authenticate with
Cookies which have been recorded for this session
Timeout in milliseconds on how long the request may take. Default = 60000 = 60 seconds.
member.returns: The website contents returned by the webserver after posting the data

member.name: M:KoenZomers.UniFi.Api.HttpUtility.LogoutViaJsonPostMethod(System.Uri,System.Net.CookieContainer,System.Int32)
member.summary: Sends a POST request to log out from the UniFi Controller
member.param: Url to POST the logout request to
Cookies which have been recorded for this session
Timeout in milliseconds on how long the request may take. Default = 60000 = 60 seconds.
member.returns: The website contents returned by the webserver after posting the data

member.name: T:KoenZomers.UniFi.Api.Responses.AccessPoint
member.summary: Details of a UniFi Access Point

member.name: T:KoenZomers.UniFi.Api.Responses.BaseResponse
member.summary: Base class to allow grouping all classes that represent UniFi Controller response messages

member.name: T:KoenZomers.UniFi.Api.Responses.Clients
member.summary: Details about one client known to UniFi

member.name: P:KoenZomers.UniFi.Api.Responses.Clients.UptimeByUapRaw
member.summary: Seconds the client already has been connected in its current session

member.name: P:KoenZomers.UniFi.Api.Responses.Clients.UptimeByUap
member.summary: TimeSpan returning how long the client has already been connected in its current session

member.name: P:KoenZomers.UniFi.Api.Responses.Clients.AccessPointMacAddress
member.summary: Mac address of the access point to which the client is connected

member.name: P:KoenZomers.UniFi.Api.Responses.Clients.IsAuthorized
member.summary: Boolean indicating if the client is authorized on the UniFi network. Only has a meaning when the client is connected to a guest network which requires consent or login first.

member.name: P:KoenZomers.UniFi.Api.Responses.Clients.AuthorizedBy
member.summary: String providing information on what authorized this client

member.name: P:KoenZomers.UniFi.Api.Responses.Clients.Channel
member.summary: The WiFi channel the client is connected to

member.name: P:KoenZomers.UniFi.Api.Responses.Clients.FirstSeenRaw
member.summary: The raw numeric value in Unix epoch time defining when the client was first seen on the UniFi network. Use FirstSeen to get a DateTime of this same value.

member.name: P:KoenZomers.UniFi.Api.Responses.Clients.FirstSeen
member.summary: Date/time indicating when this client was first seen on the UniFi network

member.name: P:KoenZomers.UniFi.Api.Responses.Clients.Hostname
member.summary: Hostname as provided by the device

member.name: P:KoenZomers.UniFi.Api.Responses.Clients.IdleTimeRaw
member.summary: Seconds the device has been idle without sending data through UniFi

member.name: P:KoenZomers.UniFi.Api.Responses.Clients.IdleTime
member.summary: TimeSpan representing the time the device has been idle without sending data through UniFi

member.name: P:KoenZomers.UniFi.Api.Responses.Clients.IpAddress
member.summary: IP Address of the client on the network

member.name: P:KoenZomers.UniFi.Api.Responses.Clients.IsGuest
member.summary: Boolean indicating if the client is logged in through a guest portal

member.name: P:KoenZomers.UniFi.Api.Responses.Clients.IsBlocked
member.summary: Boolean indicating if the client is currently blocked from accessing the UniFi network

member.name: P:KoenZomers.UniFi.Api.Responses.Clients.IsWired
member.summary: Boolean indicating if this is a wired client (true) or a client connected through WiFi (false)

member.name: P:KoenZomers.UniFi.Api.Responses.Clients.LastSeenRaw
member.summary: Seconds since January 1, 1970 when this client last communicated with a UniFi device. Use LastSeen for a DateTime representing this value.

member.name: P:KoenZomers.UniFi.Api.Responses.Clients.LastSeen
member.summary: DateTime when this client last communicated with a UniFi device

member.name: P:KoenZomers.UniFi.Api.Responses.Clients.LatestAssociationTimeRaw
member.summary: Seconds since January 1, 1970 when this client last initiated a connection to a UniFi device. Use LatestAssociationTime for a DateTime representing this value.

member.name: P:KoenZomers.UniFi.Api.Responses.Clients.LatestAssociationTime
member.summary: DateTime when this client last initiated a connection to a UniFi device

member.name: P:KoenZomers.UniFi.Api.Responses.Clients.MacAddress
member.summary: The MAC Address of the client device

member.name: P:KoenZomers.UniFi.Api.Responses.Clients.FriendlyName
member.summary: The friendly name assigned to the device through the Alias option

member.name: P:KoenZomers.UniFi.Api.Responses.Clients.Start
member.summary: Seconds since January 1, 1970 when this authorized client becomes valid. Use StartDate for a DateTime representing this value.

member.name: P:KoenZomers.UniFi.Api.Responses.Clients.StartDate
member.summary: Date and time at which this client will become authorized

member.name: P:KoenZomers.UniFi.Api.Responses.Clients.End
member.summary: Seconds since January 1, 1970 when this authorized client will no longer be valid. Use EndDate for a DateTime representing this value.

member.name: P:KoenZomers.UniFi.Api.Responses.Clients.EndDate
member.summary: Date and time at which this client will no longer be authorized

member.name: P:KoenZomers.UniFi.Api.Responses.Clients.SiteId
member.summary: Identifier of the site in UniFi to which this client is connected

member.name: P:KoenZomers.UniFi.Api.Responses.Clients.UptimeRaw
member.summary: Total seconds the client has been connected in its current session

member.name: P:KoenZomers.UniFi.Api.Responses.Clients.Uptime
member.summary: TimeSpan representing the time the client has been connected in its current session

member.name: M:KoenZomers.UniFi.Api.Responses.Clients.ToString
member.summary: Returns the friendly name of the client

member.name: T:KoenZomers.UniFi.Api.Responses.ClientSession
member.summary: Defines one client session having been connected to the UniFi network

member.name: P:KoenZomers.UniFi.Api.Responses.ClientSession.Id
member.summary: Unique identifier of the session

member.name: P:KoenZomers.UniFi.Api.Responses.ClientSession.SessionStartedAtRaw
member.summary: Seconds since January 1, 1970 when the client started this session. Use SessionStartedAt for a DateTime representing this value.

member.name: P:KoenZomers.UniFi.Api.Responses.ClientSession.SessionStartedAt
member.summary: DateTime when the client started this session

member.name: P:KoenZomers.UniFi.Api.Responses.ClientSession.SessionEndedAt
member.summary: DateTime when the client ended this session. If this DateTime is close to the current date and time, it means that the session is still active.

member.name: P:KoenZomers.UniFi.Api.Responses.ClientSession.SessionDuration
member.summary: Duration of the current session of the client in seconds

member.name: P:KoenZomers.UniFi.Api.Responses.ClientSession.SessionDurationTimeSpan
member.summary: Duration of the current session of the client as a TimeSpan

member.summary: Amount of bytes received by the client through the UniFi network

member.name: P:KoenZomers.UniFi.Api.Responses.ClientSession.ReceivedBytes
member.summary: Amount of bytes uploaded by the client through the UniFi network

member.summary: MAC Address of the client that was connected

member.name: P:KoenZomers.UniFi.Api.Responses.ClientSession.Name
member.summary: Name of the client as registered in UniFi

member.summary: Name of the device as broadcasted by the device itself

member.summary: Was this client logged on through a guest network

member.name: P:KoenZomers.UniFi.Api.Responses.ClientSession.IpAddress
member.summary: IP Address assigned to the client

member.name: P:KoenZomers.UniFi.Api.Responses.ClientSession.IsWired
member.summary: Was this client wired to the UniFi network (true) or wirelessly connected (false)

member.name: P:KoenZomers.UniFi.Api.Responses.ClientSession.AccessPointMacAddress
member.summary: MAC Address of the Access Point the client was connected to

member.summary: Meaning unknown

member.name: P:KoenZomers.UniFi.Api.Responses.ClientSession.Oid
